messages.content: Can you make ASCII art of a MacBook Pro in 3D perspective?

Here is ASCII art of a MacBook Pro in 3D perspective:

______

|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
______
That didn't look very good. Can you try with a dog instead?

Here is ASCII art of a dog in 3D perspective:

_______
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
_______
It kinda looks like a dog, can you make it take more space horizontally?

Here is ASCII art of a dog with more space horizontally:

_______

|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |
|      |

Can you make a nyan cat ascii art?
